venue.address_2: (Teele Square; just steps from Davis Square)
venue.name: PJ Ryans

item.description: A good first up win against Italy, now it is time for the 2nd game of the 2011 Rugby World Cup campaign: Wallabies vs Ireland.  Come to PJ Ryan's in Somerville to watch the replay, kickoff is 11AM.  The game is being played early Saturday morning (4AM) Boston time so if you do know the result when you come to watch please don't reveal anything.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: RWC 2011: Wallabies vs Ireland
